name: Dance Party (ThatWeirdGameDev)
description:
You are at a party when it starts to go wrong. You have to stand on a  square that is the same color of the screen. If you stand on the wrong color, you will fall! Use power ups to last as long as you can!

Controls: 

WASD/Arrows

Press space while holding a power up to use it.

Power ups:  Dash (Makes you fast) Magic Cloud (Saves you if you fall) Paintbrush (Use it to paint the tile that you are on to the color of the screen) Time Stop (Use it to stop time for 5 seconds)
